https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1A21vPycTilJhuA8o0qTMMkAmiW.jpg In pursuit of a life above the poverty line, three women find themselves in the depths of human trafficking networks. EXIT examines what it takes to regain one's dignity in the face of unthinkable trauma. EXIT
